attributes.action: That the new 2012 Olympics logo be scrapped because it is embarrassing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned plead with the Prime Minister to have the new 2012 Olympic logo scrapped and replaced with something legible, interesting and which has meaning instead of the embarrassing rubbish which has been produced.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
